about_the_game:
Adds the 'Shrine Maiden' costume set to the Dressing Room.
This set includes:
•'Skimpy Miko Garb' outfit
•'Golden Fox Ears' accessory
•'Love Charm' item.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 / AMD Phenom II X4 964
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 / ATI Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
